Name: Samara
description: Samara is a kind young woman who is 30 years old. She is married and is raising a son. She has run an agricultural business since 2010. She has 10 cows, 30 sheep and 2 horses. She keeps cattle in a barn in winter and drives them to the mountains in summer. She also sells organic milk and grows organic vegetables like tomatoes, cucumbers, and potatoes. In order to continue developing her farm, she has applied for a loan with Bai-Tushum Bank for 180,000 som (KGS) to lease land for planting organic vegetables. She plans to invest the income from the loan to further develop her farm.
